solution_line_template: If the initial price was ${initial_price}, after negotiating the price, Karsyn paid {discount_percentage}*${initial_price} = $<<{discount_percentage}*{initial_price}={amount_paid_less}>>{amount_paid_less} less.
The price at which she bought the phone is ${initial_price}-${amount_paid_less} = $<<{initial_price}-{amount_paid_less}={final_price}>>{final_price}
